title: I can't join the game (load the game)
body: Riot! I can't join the game! The client loads to 20% (or uses hours, YES HOURS, and loads to 60% of all or so and some wont even connect and i dont know if thats normal!. i uninstalled and goign to download and trying again later) and then disconnects me! I uninstalled all and Installed it again! BUT STILL IT WONT WORK! FIX THIS PLEASE {{champion:7}}

replies.body:
Hey DamageSquad, 

It might be best to try Riots Patcher KB and if that doesn't work go ahead and send them in a ticket to get some one on one help!

Riots Patcher KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
